=== 1.1.2 / 2015-07-25

* 1 bug fix:

  * Fixed focus handling when run under Rake's rake_test_loader.rb.

=== 1.1.1 / 2015-03-12

* 1 minor enhancement:

  * Escape method names in filter regexp. (ddiachkov)

=== 1.1.0 / 2013-11-07

* 1 major enhancement:

  * Minitest 5 compatibility.
    * Still works on minitest 4.

=== 1.0.0 / 2013-01-07

* 1 major enhancement

  * Birthday!
